direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stephanie is smiling as she enters the station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FIELDS REPRESENTATIVE holds a platter of freshly baked cookies and offers free samples to passersby. One is offered to Stephanie. She politely declines as she walks past with a bounce in her step.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She stops at the window, admiring a coat on display. She glances down at her own coat. Notes the missing button. with distaste. Inside, a SALESWOMAN is preparing to open the shop. Stephanie taps on the window, shouts through the glass:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Good morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Saleswoman opens the door a crack. t SALESWOMAN I'm sorry, we're not open yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please. I know what I want. That coat in the window. The Saleswoman considers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My boyfriend and I are taking a very special trip this morning. Stephanie's smile is bright. Her joy is contagious. The Saleswoman relents and lets Stephanie in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moments before sunrise, the sky is streaked red. Ray waits on the train platform, clutching two tickets and a small garment bag. Behind him, other Passengers arrive. From his pocket, he removes a velvet case. He opens it and peeks t inside A diamond ring. He stows it back in his pocket. He looks for Stephanie. Then, his face brightens as Stephanie emerges from the crowd, radiant in her, new coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ray! Ray embraces her and grabs her luggage. A TRAIN WHISTLE sounds as the train approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is everything okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so glad you're here. There's so much I've been meaning to tell you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She takes his hand. 0 90.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But let me say this first while I have it straight in my head. You never stopped believing in me. I'll try and live up to that. They share an intimate moment. A romantic kiss. He breaks off and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I tell you, you look great?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. Stephanie models her new coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like it? It's brand new.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd you do with your old coat? Just the mention of it, makes her face darken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got rid of it. I never want to see it again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too bad,'cause I just found this. Ray produces the envelope. And from it, withdraws... THE CURSED BUTTON!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: UP OF THE BUTTON with a terrible CLASHING of symbols!. Stephanie can't breathe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, it was in my car. Hey, have you seen my Indian Head nickel? I put it in an envelope just like this one. Stephanie stares at the button, shaking her head in disbelief. The RUMBLING of the approaching train builds on the sound track.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? What is it? She backs away in horror, but Ray follows her with the button still in his hand. The RUMBLING grows louder. She's backing up toward the edge of the platform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stephanie. Stop! Ray steps forward, still holding out the button. Stephanie
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as she falls backwards, off the platform and onto the tracks. In her last moment of life, she turns her head to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Racing at her! Through the swirling smoke, the engine's mechanical face, resembles the goat like face of the demon Lamia. It VOMITS STEAM as it angrily bares down upon her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Stephanie recognizes the sound. It's a cry she's heard before. In every door creak... in every cold night wind... a haunting, soulless sound... the cry of Lamia. Ray races to the edge of the platform. The two lover's eyes find each other one last time. Stephanie SCREAMS as the Lamia swallows her and pulls her down into hell.
direction.name: direction
